revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver. |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28. }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 130,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || colspan=2 rowspan=10|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Doduo.png|40px]] Doduo |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Ursaring.png|40px]] Ursaring |- | [[File:Donphan.png|40px]] Donphan |- | [[File:Teddiursa.png|40px]] Teddiursa |- | [[File:Phanpy.png|40px]] Phanpy |- | [[File:Quagsire.png|40px]] Quagsire |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Larvitar.png|40px]] Larvitar || <center> 840,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
